casebody.data:
Laborde, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. Ríos, Defendant and Appellee. Laborde, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. López, Defendant and Appellee. Laborde, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. Lorenzo, Defendant and Appellee. Appeals from the District Court of Humacao in Actions for Damages for Breach of Contract. Nos. 1292, 1293, 1294. Decided July 25, 1915. Decided on tlie grounds of the opinion delivered in Case No. 1295, Laborde, plaintiff and appellant, v. Toro, defendant and appellee, ante. Messrs. Aponte & Aponte and Juan B. Hughe for the appellees. Chief Justice Hernandez and Justices Wolf, del Toro, Aldrey and Hutchison concurred.

Mr. Eugenio Benitez Castaño for the appellant.

Reversed.
